alert.note: Alert for Adams; Buffalo; Kearney (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 6:10PM CDT until August 10 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Adams County in south central Nebraska... Northeastern Kearney County in south central Nebraska... Southeastern Buffalo County in south central Nebraska... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 610 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Heartwell, or 16 miles east of Kearney, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Heartwell around 625 PM CDT. Kenesaw around 630 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 288 and 290. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
